name: Escape Escape (itch)
description:
The factory is going into self-destruct mode, and the worker robots are fighting to escape.

Can you guide both robots out of the factory, before the crusher gets you?

(You've beat the game when you reach the blue portal at the end of the level, and it takes you back to the Title Screen)

*This is my second project created in the Godot Game Engine as a solo-dev for the United Game Jam 2020, plenty of changes that I could like to make if I were to revisit this project, including:*

- Different Levels

- Different mechanics

- Timer to see how fast you can escape

- More animations (for example the win condition)

** Sounds Used:

https://freesound.org/people/ShahruhAudio/sounds/336879/

https://freesound.org/people/FawfulGrox/sounds/103336/

Track - 04. Twist Turn Slide - https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Psychadelik_Pedestrian
